LEG_ORIG_SCHED_OUT_ZULU_TMSTP.description: Scheduled OUT (departure) timestamp at the leg origin in Zulu/UTC time (ISO 8601 with offset).

LEG_CARGO_WGT.description: Observed/actual cargo weight for the leg (as provided by the source).

LEG_MAX_OP_PAYLD_WGT.description: Maximum operational payload weight for the leg (capacity limit as provided by the source).

LEG_LAST_UPDATE_ZULU_TMSTP.description: Timestamp (Zulu/UTC) indicating when this leg record was last updated (ISO 8601 with offset).

ds.description: Datestamp used for the forecast record (as provided; appears as an Excel-style date string).

predict_total_weight.description: Forecasted total weight for the leg (model output).

predict_cube_ft.description: Forecasted total cube (volume) in cubic feet for the leg (model output).

wb_key_flight_number.description: Flight number identifier associated with the forecast record.

predict_type.description: Forecast type/category label (e.g., 'LT' in the sample).
